item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-03-06
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Green Tea (24 Elliot Street, Newton). #
  • Spent the day @workbarboston, what a great place! I'm going to try to make it over there every friday! #
  • I'm at City Feed and Supply (672 Centre Street, at Seaverns Avenue, Jamaica Plain). #
  • I'm at J.P. Licks (Jamaica Plain) (659 Centre St, Jamaica Plain). #
  • It's warm today! #
  • Not a horrible deal, stay 3 nights or more @ Mirage LV and get two free tickets to LOVE or Terry Fator. #

Powered by Twitter Tools
